title: The Romance of Runnibede
creator_credit: Phillips Film Productions and Scott R. Dunlap
brief_description: Filmed in Sydney interiors and south-east Queensland locations, this melodrama is based on one of the incidents in Steele Rudd’s book involving the kidnapping of a woman from the family cattle station by Aborigines who believe that she is their ‘great white queen’. Beset by production problems and discord and marred by the inadequate performances of the two male leads, Runnibede was reshaped by an imported American director for the international market. The Aborigines in effect become head-hunters from Hollywood’s darkest Africa mythology. Cast includes Eva Novak, Gordon Collingridge, Claude Saunders and Dunstan Webb. Restored on video using original tinted nitrate reels of the film.
